title: Tadanobu Asano, Yukino Kishii Starrer ‘All the Lovers in the Night’ Boarded by Bitters End for International Sales Ahead of Berlin EFM (EXCLUSIVE)
summary: Japanese sales and distribution company Bitters End has acquired international rights to “All the Lovers in the Night,” Yukiko Sode’s feature adaptation of Mieko Kawakami’s celebrated novel starring Golden Globe winner Tadanobu Asano (“Shōgun”) in a key supporting role. Japan Academy Prize winner Y…
